newsitem.title: GERMANY: German bank - 4 mo gp oper profit up.
newsitem.headline: German bank - 4 mo gp oper profit up.

text.p: (in millions of marks unless otherwise stated)
Group oper profit before provisions 419.5 up 21.4 pct
Own account trading profit 49.4 down 20.8 pct
Group net interest income 1,160 up 7.3 pct
Group net commission income 130.8 up 56.8 pct
NOTE - Full name of the German cooperative bank is Deutsche Genossenschaftsbank AG. Percentage changes compare first four months of 1997 with one third of full year 1996 results.
